name: B.F. Sword
description: +15 Attack Damage

name: Recurve Bow
description: +15% Attack Speed

name: Needlessly Large Rod
description: +20% Spell Power

name: Tear of the Goddess
description: +15 Mana

name: Chain Vest
description: +25 Armor

name: Negatron Cloak
description: +25 Magic Resist

name: Giant's Belt
description: +200 Health

name: Spatula
description: You will get a special ability

name: Sparring Gloves
description: +10% Dodge change, +10% Crit chance

name: Deathblade
description: Contributing to a kill grants +25 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 2).

name: Giant Slayer
description: The holder's spells and basic attacks do 20% bonus true damage. if the target has more than 1750 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 80%

name: Hextech Gunblade
description: 45% healing from spell damage. Overhealing with this item now generates a shield (max 400 Health).

name: Spear of Shojin
description: After first casting their spell, the holder's basic attacks restore 18% of their maximum mana on-hit

name: Guardian Angel
description: Wearer revives with 400 HP

name: Bloodthirster
description: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for 45% of the damage dealt.

name: Zeke's Herald
description: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

name: Blade of the Ruined King
description: Wearer is also a Blademaster

name: Infinity Edge
description: [Unique] The holder gains 20% bonus critical strike damage, and 100% critical hit chance.

name: Rapid Firecannon
description: +200% Range and holder’s attacks can’t miss.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
description: Basic Attacks grant +5% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. No stacking limit.

name: Statikk Shiv
description: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 85 magic damage to 3/4/5 enemies. Additional 85 True Damage if the target has a shield or is CC’d.

name: Titan's Resolve
description: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a 2% stacking damage bonus. Stacks up to 25 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

name: Runaan's Hurricane
description: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.

name: Zz'Rot Portal
description: When the wearer dies, a Construct with 1500/2250/3000 ★ Health aries to continue the fight.

name: Infiltrator's Talons
description: The wearer gains the Infiltrator trait.

name: Last Whisper
description: When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 75% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
description: Wearer's Spell Power stat is amplified by 50%

name: Luden's Echo
description: When the wearer casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 200 magic damage.

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
description: Shields allies within two hexes in the same row for 250 / 300 / 375 damage for 8 seconds (scales with wearer’s Star Level)

name: Ionic Spark
description: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 40% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 225% of their max Mana.

name: Morellonomicon
description: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

name: Battlecast Armor
description: The wearer gains the Battlecast trait

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
description: Holder’s spells can crit and holder gains +30% Critical Strike Damage.

name: Seraph's Embrace
description: Sets holder's mana to 20 after each cast.

name: Frozen Heart
description: Angrenzende Gegner verlieren 50% Angriffstempo. (Stacking increases the radius of this effect, not the amount of the slow)

name: Chalice of Favor
description: At start of combat, the holder and their left and right neighbors gain 30 AP for 20 seconds.

name: Redemption
description: When the wearer dies, allies are healed for 800 Health.

name: Star Guardian's Charm
description: The wearer gains the Star Guardian trait.

name: Hand Of Justice
description: At the begining of Each planning phase, gain one: Deal +45% more damage / Grants 45% healing from damage done by both abilities and basic attacks.

name: Bramble Vest
description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 100 / 140 / 200 magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 second maximum). Scales with wearer’s Star Level

name: Sword Breaker
description: 33% chance to disarm for 3 seconds

name: Red Buff
description: Gains 10% max hp true damage over 4 seconds on hit in addition to its burn. And reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

name: Rebel Medal
description: The wearer gains the Rebel trait.

name: Shroud of Stillness
description: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 30% until they cast.

name: Dragon's Claw
description: Reduces incoming magic damage by 50%

name: Zephyr
description: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

name: Celestial Orb
description: The wearer gains the Celestial trait.

name: Quicksilver
description: [UNIQUE] The wearer is immute to croud control for the first 10 seconds of combat

name: Warmog's Armor
description: +600 Additional Health.

name: Protector's Chestguard
description: The wearer gains the Protector trait.

name: Trap Claw
description: Start combat with a spell shield. Stun the champion that breaks it for 4 sec

name: Force of Nature
description: Gain +1 team size

name: Dark Star's Heart
description: The wearer gains the Dark Star trait.

name: Thief's Gloves
description: Each planning phase, fetch two temporary items, quality based upon your player level. [Consumes Three item Slots]
